dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5598 IH: Revitalizing Rural Communities Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Nunn of Iowa (for himself and Mr. Davis of North Carolina) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To extend and increase funding for the Rural Economic Development Loan and Grant Program of the Department of Agriculture, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Revitalizing Rural Communities Act of 2025.

section.header: Extension of, and increase in funding for, the Rural Economic Development Loan and Grant Program
section.text: Section 313B of the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 (7 U.S.C. 940câ€“2) is amended by striking $10,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting $12,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2030.
